job.title: DevOps Engineer-Cryptoassets
job.description: pstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppbrpulliParticipate in designing and supporting highly available systemsliliContinue to push efforts for building out infra on KubernetesliliContinue to enhance monitoring infra using Prometheus Grafana Alerta and SplunkliliEnhance CICD processes leveraging declarative configuration tools like ConcourseliliHelp create easily repeatable patterns for local development to migrate to productionliliManage large amounts of data on varying types of storageliliSupport and enhance highly available database architectureliliBuild and enhance tooling used by the DevOps teamliliResearch and implement new technologiesliliConsistently challenge the norm and advocate for changeliulpstrongRequired Skills and ExperiencestrongpulliPrior experience supporting mission critical high performance applicationsliliDeploying and supporting applications in KubernetesliliMonitoring applications using Prometheus and GrafanaliliDeveloped CICD pipelines for Kubernetes deploymentsliliSolid Python experienceliliPostgres support for highly available systemsliliPrevious Linux platform support experienceliliBasic knowledge of TLSliliDemonstrated knowledge of network communications experience including multicast and websocketsliliFlexibility to take offhours support calls as needs dictateliliExperience using ansible to manage infrastructureliulpstrongDesired Personal CharacteristicsstrongpulliAbility to learn quickly a passion for new technologyliliSelfmotivated to continually expand skillset and improve supported systemsliliDemonstrated high level of ownership and accountabilityliliAbility to handle pressure and time constraints with composureliliStrong organizational skills including planning prioritization and documentationliullili
